# Beep

<section class="intro">

Beep boop.

</section>

<!-- /.intro -->

<section class="usage">

## Usage

```javascript
var path = require( 'path' );
```

#### path.posix.join( [...paths] )

Joins a path.

```javascript
setTimeout( onTimeout, 0 );

function onTimeout() {
	var x = 3.14;
}
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->

